title: Can't view my friends?!?
body: I currently can't open up my friends list on the client; similarly, I cannot open the groups or notifications list. Nothing else seems to be wrong, other than maybe slight lag. And yes, I do have friends.

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see your friends list is just fine!  It sounds like your network may be having a problem staying connected to the chat server.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up and get you back in chat!  Let me know if you have any questions!
